== Chikkamalalavadi Chathurbaga (612504) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Chikkamalalavadi Chathurbaga is a village in the [[Kunigal ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 101.39 hectares and harbouring 27 households with total population of 108 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kunigal]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 52 and female population is 56. Scheduled Caste Population is 0 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 612504<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
